features: [Used as a Selfie Stick & a Mini Tripod]: It is made to easily convert between a selfie stick and a mini tripod with three built-in foldable legs

[Adjustable Height and Angle]: It is designed with three adjustable height levels. You can extend the height from 9.05 inches to 17.5 inches when using as a selfie stick and extend the height from 6.69 inches to 15.15 inches when using as a mini tripod. The tripod head ball-joint allows for 360-degree rotation and up to a 90-degree tilt

[Stable and Durable]: Weighing-in at 0.45 lb. with a foldable height of 9.05 inches and supports device up to 3.3 lb (1.5 Kg), it is easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. It is made of highly-durable ABS and designed with soft rubber on the feet to keep it from damaging any surface or from slipping and improve stability

[Wide Compatibility]: It has a standard 1/4’’-20 mounting male screw on the top. This fits for an Entry-level DSLR camera, mirrorless camera, point and shoot camera, compact camcorder, Zoom recorder, selfie stick, mini projector and other devices with standard 1/4"-20 female thread. It can also be applied to a phone through the included phone clamp, fits mainstream smartphones from 2.2 to 3.7 inches wide

[Cold Shoe Extension]: Comes with a cold shoe mount and two 1/4''-20 screw holes on the side of ball head, multiple pieces of equipment can be used at the same time such as: microphone, LED light, cold shoe adapter, magic arm and more. Suitable for vlogging, selfie, video recording, live stream etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Note: The two cold shoe extension arms, LED light and microphone are NOT included

The side of tripod head features one cold shoe mount for attaching the extension arm and features two 1/4''-20 screw holes for attaching the shoe adapters, which extends cold shoe mounts for the microphone, LED light and other photographic gears, allows multiple pieces of equipment to be set up at the same time.

2 in 1 design, can be used as a mini tripod and as a selfie stick for Vlog, selfie, live streaming, video recording etc. You can mount a lightweight camera, smartphone, Gopro, LED light or other devices through the top 1/4"-20 screw to this tripod(Gopro tripod mount is not included). Included phone clamp fits most smartphones from 2.2-3.7''/ 56-95 mm wide. Extendable rod supports 4-segment extension adjustment, the height is 6.69-15.15''/ 17-38.5cm when used as a mini tripod, while used as a hand grip is 9.05-17.5''/ 23-44.5cm. Ball head is 360-degree rotatable and 90-degree tilt, meets different angle you want and allows a horizontal and vertical shooting.

360-Degree Rotation & 90-Degree Tilt The ball head is 360-degree rotatable and 90-degree tiltable, it can meet the needs of different shooting angles. Locking Knob You can keep the angle you need by locking the knob for secure hold, or loosening the knob to change the angle. Padded with Anti-Slip Silicone Silicone on the bottom of tripod legs adds stability for tripod standing and protects the tabletop from scratches.

Specification Screw on the Top 1/4"-20 Stud Height as a Mini Tripod 6.69-15.15'' Height as a Hand Grip 9.05-17.5'' Net Weight 0.45 lb. Max. Load 3.3 lb.(when it is not extendable) Range of Phone Clamp 2.2-3.7'' Ball Head 360° rotation and 90° tilt

It is compatible with any device below 3.3 lb, below are a few devices for your reference: Entry-level DSLR Cameras: Canon Rebel T7, T6, T8i, T7i, T6i, SL3, SL2, 70D, 80D, 90D Nikon D3400, D3500, D5300, D5600 etc. (Attenion: May not support heavier DSLR camera + heavier lens) Mirrorless Cameras: Sony ZV-E1, ZV-1F, ZV-E10, A6600, A6500, A6400, A6300, A6100, A6000, A7C, A7 Series Fujifilm X-T4, X-T3, X-T2, X-T1, X-T30, X-T20, X-T10, X-E4, X-E3, X-T200, X-T100 Panasonic G100, G7, G9, G85, GX85 Canon EOS M50, M50 Mark II, M5, M6, M6 Mark II, EOS R, R5, R6, R7, R10, RP Nikon Z30, Z50, Z fc, Z5, Z6, Z7, Z6II, Z7II etc. Point-and-Shoot Cameras: Sony ZV-1 II, ZV-1, RX100 VII, RX100 VI, RX100 VA, RX100 V Canon G7X Mark III, G7X Mark II, G5X Mark II, G9X Fujifilm X100V, X100F, X100T, X100S, XF10 Panasonic LX100II, ZS100, ZS200 etc. Compact Camcorders: Canon VIXIA HF R800, HF R82, HF R700 Sony HDR-CX455, HDR-CX440, HDR-CX675 etc. Smartphone with width from 2.2-3.7''/ 56-95 mmGoPro hero action camera(Please note: Gopro tripod mount is not included)Recorder: Zoom H6, H5, H4N etc. ......And others devices with 1/4-20 female thread such as LED light, selfie stick, mini projector,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The tripod is great, flexible and sturdy enough to distribute a significant weight and keep a trey standing. The ball mount system looks solid and the lock is very easy to engage and disengage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a great product!
reviews.reviewText: I feel this is a great product. It holds my point and shoot camera very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Vlogging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purpose -Bicycle Rides Pictures
reviews.reviewText: I give a 4 because it the size I wanted. I plan to use it on bicycle rides when I stop to take certain pictures.I have to see how durable it is to give it an accurate rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: hold my sony zv camera and my phone great, feels sturdy, and has to where you can add a light and something else on the other side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to set up , I have no trouble at all. It stands good on its own & also rotates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This mini tripod is great for a phone or small camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No phone attachment included, despite one shown in the promotional images
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product, in part because I hoped it, in fact, had the phone attachment as pictured in the last image of the promotional sequence this page. It does not. I believe they should change out that last image just to make it clear the tripod is ready for other cameras, but not phone cameras. The neck also does not raise, in case you wondered. Otherwise it seems fine. Product is made in China and has instructions and specs. printed on the box in English, German, and Chinese. The ball can pivot and tilt the head to about a 30 degree angle, give or take, on each of three sides. The fourth side has a slot where the ball can pivot the head to a 90 degree angle. The ball is very tight, out of the box. Lubricating it a little should allow easier movement without compromising one's ability to "stick" the position of the camera. The tripod is light weight, seems sturdy, and easy to grip.
